content.query:
CREATE SCHEMA [raw] AUTHORIZATION [dbo]
GO

CREATE TABLE [raw].[Account_Details]
(
    [Account] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Account Description] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Account Type Description] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [MR Account] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [MR Account Description] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Statuary Account Description] VARCHAR(MAX)
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    HEAP
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [raw].[ACT_CONSOLIDATED_FINANCIAL_STATEMENTS]
(
    [MONTH] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Entity] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Layer] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [ACT - Conso Node Layer Value] VARCHAR(MAX)
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    HEAP
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [raw].[ACT_SALES_PRICE_DETAILED]
(
    [Month] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Entity] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Product] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Other Revenue Details] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Price Component] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [ACT- Revenue Net Back Prices] VARCHAR(MAX)    
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    HEAP
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [raw].[ACT_SALES_VOLUMES]
(
    [Month] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Entity] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Volume Type] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Other Revenue Details] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Product] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [ACT - Revenue Volumes] VARCHAR(MAX)            
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    HEAP
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [raw].[ACT_CAPEX_CASH]
(
    [MONTH] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Entity] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Project Sub-type] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [ACT - CAPEX Cash] VARCHAR(MAX)           
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    HEAP
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [raw].[Consolidated_Cash]
(
[Grouping] VARCHAR(MAX),
[Cash Type] VARCHAR(MAX),
[Company Sector] VARCHAR(MAX),
[Company] VARCHAR(MAX),
[Bank] VARCHAR(MAX),
[AccountNumber] VARCHAR(MAX),
[All (USD)] VARCHAR(MAX),
[All (USD)(Prev)] VARCHAR(MAX),
[Delta All (USD)] VARCHAR(MAX),
[USD (CCY)] VARCHAR(MAX),
[EUR (CCY)] VARCHAR(MAX),
[EGP (CCY)] VARCHAR(MAX),
[GBP (CCY)] VARCHAR(MAX),
[DZD (CCY)] VARCHAR(MAX),
[JPY (CCY)] VARCHAR(MAX),
[AED (CCY)] VARCHAR(MAX),
[CNY (CCY)] VARCHAR(MAX)          
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    HEAP
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [raw].[ENTITY]
(
    [Entity] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Entity Description] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [OCINVT_IFRS] VARCHAR(MAX)      
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    HEAP
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [raw].[FCT_CAPEX_CASH]
(
[Month] VARCHAR(MAX),
[Entity] VARCHAR(MAX),
[Scenario] VARCHAR(MAX),
[Plan Year] VARCHAR(MAX),
[Project Sub-type] VARCHAR(MAX),
[Version] VARCHAR(MAX),
[PLAN - CAPEX Cash - Project Sub-type] VARCHAR(MAX)      
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    HEAP
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [raw].[FCT_CONSOLIDATED_FINANCIAL_STATEMENTS]
(
    [Month] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Entity] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Account] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Layer] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Counterparty] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Consolidation Node] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Scenario] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Plan Year] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Version] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [PLAN - Conso Layer Value] VARCHAR(MAX)
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    HEAP
)
GO


CREATE TABLE [raw].[FCT_SALES_PRICE_DETAILED]
(
    [Month] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Entity] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Counterparty] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Scenario] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Plan Year] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Version] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Trading/Own Produced] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Product] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Price Component] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Volume Type] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [PLAN - Revenue Net Back Prices] VARCHAR(MAX)

)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    HEAP
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [raw].[FCT_SALES_VOLUMES]
(
[Month] VARCHAR(MAX),
[Entity] VARCHAR(MAX),
[Scenario] VARCHAR(MAX),
[Plan Year] VARCHAR(MAX),
[Version] VARCHAR(MAX),
[Product] VARCHAR(MAX),
[Volume Type] VARCHAR(MAX),
[PLAN - Sold Volumes] VARCHAR(MAX)
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    HEAP
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [raw].[Net Debt Consolidated]
(
    [As Of] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Formula] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Company(Deal)] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Nebt Debt Grouping] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Nebt Debt Category] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [TranType5] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Total Net Debt (USD)] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Cash] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Deferred Costs] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Short Term Debt] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Long Term Debt] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Account] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [TranType12] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [FlowClass] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Company] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Cpty(Deal)] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [TranRef] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Facility] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Currency] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [FlowDate] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [InterestRate] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [CurrentInterestRate] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [CurrentSpread] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Days to Deal Maturity] VARCHAR(MAX)
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    HEAP
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [raw].[PROJECT]
(
    [Project] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Project Description] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Project Type] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Project Type Description] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Project SubType] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Project Category] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Project SubType Description] VARCHAR(MAX),
    [Project Category Description] VARCHAR(MAX)

)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    HEAP
)
GO
